name: Instagram Blacked
description:
instagram

*don't ask for quick updates ever
*this work is mine and I don't know anything about creating web pages, or design, I just use my
 head a little
*if there is a style available just use it
*I create all styles just for myself,but the page requires me to share my work,
 so if you don't like it just don't use it,but if you like it use it and enjoy it,
*enjoy and be polite
additional_info:
*release

*Important:
  -please dont enable dark mode in google chrome,this style only works in light-mode
  -when the creator of this website enables dark mode,
   so i'll update everything to keep it in dark in all modes
  -if you enable dark mode in "chrome://flags", the styling will not display correctly
